scripts.start: docker-compose build && docker-compose up && npm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.test: docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' jest && docker-compose down
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org stable-7j --project node-express ./src && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org stable-7j --project node-express ./src
